column4: Barnagar - Village Katajhar Pathar | As per field verification done by Lot Mandal and Field Officer sever erosion by River Beki is occuring in the village Katajhar Pathar. Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022.Two (2) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=179 Female=165 Child=124 Pregnant=1 Disability=1 Total=470(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) (2)3 no. Bashbari LP School, Male=86 Female=83 Child=77 Pregnant=2 Total=248(Latitude-26.426476 Longitude-90.759589) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Bashbari no 2 Temp.Shelter, Male=55, Femele=45, Child=25,(Toatl=125,Latitude-26.4709483 Longitude-90.748884)Total Inmates 843. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 06.08.2022, Total Population-843. erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 06.08.2022 | 0

Athani - Salmara Pt-III, Bondihana, Dimatola Poyestichar, Podmeralga Pt-I, Podmeralga Pt-II, Patakata Pt-II | Erosion occurred from 15/7/2022 to 06/08/2022 at Village Patakata Pt-II (Andamari Parghat) by river Tipkai, land measuring 0.6 Hector of Agriculture land were eroded. Also Erosion occurred from 15/7/2022 to 06/08/2022 at Village Salmara Pt-III, Bondihana, Dimatola Poyestichar, Podmeralga Pt-I, Podmeralga Pt-II, by River Brahmaputra.Land measuring 4.5 Hector of Agriculture land were eroded. No house damage occurred due to the erosion. | 0
